AI Description: fwdpy11 is a flexible and efficient Python library for forward-time population genetics simulations. It provides tools for simulating a wide range of evolutionary scenarios and analyzing the resulting genetic data.
Core Features: Simulation Of Genetic Drift, Forward-Time Population Genetics Modeling, Genetic Data Analysis Tools, Support For Various Evolutionary Scenarios, Efficient & Flexible Simulation Capabilities
General Tags: Population Genetics, Genetic Simulation, Python Library, Genetic Data Analysis
